mean_cn: n. 航空航天（业）；  adj. 航空与航天的，宇宙空间的
mean_en: the industry of building aircraft, vehicles and equipment to be sent into space
sentence: I work in the aerospace industry - I've loved space exploration since I was young.
sentence_trans: 我在航空航天领域工作——我从小就对空间探索感兴趣。
word_etyma: aero空气，充气 + space空间 →（大气层内外）空间
